class SmsFactory

Detailed Description

3GPP TS 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.2.4] - Attention: This class is a wrapper over a data-stream (no data is copied). Only the anchor of the byte-stream is needed the initialize the access to the class members.

INT SmsCommand::GetMaxUserDataSize (   )  const
 

Returns the maximum possible size (in bytes) of the userdata (inclusive the userdata-length byte). The size varies dependent on the size of the header-parameter.
